verbose_text: Since miR-524-5p expression is suppressed by the TGF-beta1+ BMP2 stimulus, SOX9 expression increases and leads to activation of the differentiation markers COL2A1, ACAN and COL10A1.
evidence: suppressed by the TGF-beta1+BMP2 stimulus, SOX9 expression increases and leads to activation of the differentiation markers COL2A1
